content: Use the search LDAP filter to select the users who must be imported.

comment.text: This translation key is used to provide a tooltip explaining the purpose of an LDAP user filter field in a connection settings page. The tooltip appears when hovering over the label and provides context for users unfamiliar with LDAP filters.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '検索LDAPフィルタを使用して、インポートするユーザーを選択してください' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Japanese. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning with better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAPフィルタを使用して、インポートするユーザーを選択します。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of katakana for 'LDAP' is technically correct, but using a combination of katakana and hiragana/kanji could improve readability depending on the target audience and overall text style.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAPフィルタを使用して、インポートするユーザーを選択します。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '가져오기 해야 하는' is not the most natural way to express 'who must be imported'. It's grammatically correct, but sounds a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 검색 LDAP 필터를 사용하여 가져올 사용자를 선택하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses "ຕົວປ່ຽນແກ້ໄຂຕົວກວດກາ" which translates to 'filter editor checker.' This is overly literal and doesn't convey the meaning of 'search LDAP filter' clearly. A more natural translation would be something that emphasizes searching or filtering users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ນໍາໃຊ້ຕົວປ່ຽນແກ້ໄຂການຄົ້ນຫາ LDAP ເພື່ອເລືອກເອົາຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ຈະນໍາເຂົ້າມາ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation includes a full stop (។) at the end of the sentence. While this is grammatically correct, it's often omitted in UI tooltips, especially in shorter phrases. Consider removing it for consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ນໍາໃຊ້ຕົວປ່ຽນແກ້ໄຂການຄົ້ນຫາ LDAP ເພື່ອເລືອກເອົາຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ຈະນໍາເຂົ້າມາ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'die zullen worden geïmporteerd' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'die geïmporteerd moeten worden'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gebruik Zoek LDAP filter om gebruikers te selecteren die geïmporteerd moeten worden.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Folosiți filtru de căutare LDAP pentru a selecta utilizatorii pentru importul.' is grammatically awkward. The preposition 'pentru' is redundant. It should be 'pentru a importa utilizatorii' or 'pentru selecția utilizatorilor'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Folosiți filtru de căutare LDAP pentru a selecta utilizatorii care trebuie importați.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ප්‍රාණයනය සඳහා ආනයනය කළ යුතු පරිශීලකයින් තෝරා ගැනීමට සෙවුම් LDAP පෙරකය භාවිතා කරන්න' is not a precise translation of 'Use the search LDAP filter to select the users who must be imported.' 'ප්‍රාණයනය' (pranayanaya) translates to 'animation' or 'incarnation', which is not appropriate in this context. 'පරිශීලකයින්' translates to 'enthusiasts', which is also not accurate. The intended meaning of 'users' is lost.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ප්‍රේශනය සඳහා ආනයනය කිරීමට අවශ්‍ය පරිශීලකයින් තෝරා ගැනීම සඳහා සෙවුම් LDAP පෙරකය භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the suggestion above attempts correction, the entire phrasing can be improved for better flow and natural Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ආනයනය කිරීමට අවශ්‍ය පරිශීලකයින් තෝරා ගැනීම සඳහා සෙවුම් LDAP පෙරකය භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pomocou filtra na vyhľadávanie LDAP vyberte používateľov, ktorí musia byť importovaní' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness in Slovak. 'na vyhľadávanie LDAP' is awkward. A better phrasing would convey the same meaning more smoothly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Použite LDAP filter na výber používateľov, ktorí sa majú importovať.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'uvoziti' could be improved. While technically correct, 'uvesti' is more commonly used in this context and sounds more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Uporabi iskalni filter LDAP, da izbereš uporabnike, ki jih je potrebno uvesti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "да бисте изабрали" is a bit wordy and less natural in this context. A more direct translation of 'to select' would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Користите LDAP филтер за претрагу да бисте изабрали кориснике који треба да се увезу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Koristite LDAP filter za pretragu da biste izabrali korisnike koji moraju biti uvezeni' is a bit too literal and could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Serbian. The phrase 'za pretragu' (for searching) is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite LDAP filter da biste izabrali korisnike koji moraju biti uvezeni.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is slightly awkward and doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of the English phrase. 'İçe aktarılması gereken kullanıcıları seçmek için' is a bit verbose and could be improved. A more natural phrasing would better convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcıları içe aktarmak için arama LDAP filtresini kullanın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'phải được nhập' implies a mandatory import, which may not be the intended meaning. It's more accurate to convey a choice or option.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng bộ lọc tìm kiếm LDAP để chọn người dùng sẽ được nhập.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'nhập' can have multiple meanings. In this context, it's likely referring to 'imported' or 'added'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng bộ lọc tìm kiếm LDAP để chọn người dùng cần được nhập.
